item.title: Mobile app development, Google Dev tools Code School, TekPub
item.author: jkat98@gmail.com (Jason Krol)
item.description: I completed the Code School course on using Google Chrome Dev Tools. I highly recommend you complete this course – its super quick (probably no longer than 1 hour) and very easy. Yet, I learned a lot. Specifically with the more advanced topics of the dev tools like Profiling, Memory Leaks, Framerates, etc. Started writing my hybrid mobile app for work – learned quite a bit along the way. Working with jQuery Mobile, but its overhead and conventions/takeover is making it less than desirable – perhaps Iâ€™ll rewrite the transition animations manually and implement 3rd party Touch/Tap library.
